name: Bacon-Cheddar Pinwheels
author: Pillsbury
summary: Ranch dressing perks up a crowd-pleasing, cheesy crescent appetizer.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can Pillsbury® refrigerated crescent dinner rolls or Pillsbury® Crescent Recipe Creations® refrigerated seamless dough sheet
¼ cup cooked real bacon pieces
½ cup finely shredded Cheddar cheese
directions: If using crescent rolls: Unroll dough; separate into 2 long rectangles
Press each into 12x4-inch rectangle, firmly pressing perforations to seal
If using dough sheet: Unroll dough; cut lengthwise into 2 long rectangles
Spread dressing over each rectangle to edges
Sprinkle each with bacon, Cheddar cheese and onions
Starting with one short side, roll up each rectangle; press edge to seal
With serrated knife, cut each roll into 8 slices; place cut side down on ungreased cookie sheet
Bake 12 to 17 minutes or until edges are deep golden brown
